Description: {{PageRef|Other|alt_name=General}}
* {{PageRef|Trooper}}s now gain 50% resistance when they are in near the base (this has been 30% the past few days)
* Distance allowed to shoot {{PageRef|Shrine}}s increased by 7m
* Hero Kill Bounty increased from 175→1600 to 250→1800 (maxes out at 45 min)
* 2 hero {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} split ratio increased from 60% to 65%
* {{PageRef|Walker}} HP increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|Walker}}s resistance vs troopers reaches -40% at 20 minutes instead of 16 minutes
* {{PageRef|Objective}}s Spirit Resistance reduced from 50% to 40%
* The {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} {{PageRef|Soul Orb|alt_name=orb}} securer's advantage over denier has been reduced.
* Add a flash to the start of the {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} {{PageRef|Soul Orb|alt_name=orb}} claimability window
Map
* Moved outer lane {{PageRef|Base Guardian}}s down to the lower landing.
* Added interior connection from lower landing to the ropes.
* Flattened the shape of the outer lane base bridges.
Heroes
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Move Speed reduced from 6.8 to 6.5
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Rejuvenating Aurora}} T3 reduced from 3% to 2.5%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Stamina Cooldown increased from 5s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Health per boon reduced from 86 to 82
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Essence Bomb}} self damage spirit scaling increased from 1.3 to 1.6
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Life Drain}} cast range reduced from 20m to 18m
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} T3 reduced from 3.5% to 3%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Move Speed reduced from 7 to 6.8
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Health per boon reduced from 81 to 77
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Base {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} damage reduced from 4.95 to 4.6
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Health per boon reduced from 64 to 53
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Now has -20% Crit Bonus Scale (like {{PageRef|Kelvin}})
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.33 to 0.28
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} T2 reduced from +70 DPS to +60
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} spirit power scaling increased from 1.3 to 1.4
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Health per boon reduced from 65 to 57
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Full Auto}} T2 spirit damage per bullet reduced from 5 to 4
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Crimson Slash}} T2 heal reduced from 8% to 6%
Weapon Items
* {{PageRef|Close Quarters}}: {{PageRef|Melee}} Resistance increased from 15% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Extended Magazine}}: Max Ammo increased from 25% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}: Cooldown increased from 6s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Monster Rounds}}: Out of Combat regen reduced from 1.5 to 1
* {{PageRef|Restorative Shot}}: Weapon Damage increased from 6% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Restorative Shot}}: Cooldown reduced from 7s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Active Reload}}: No longer goes on cooldown when it doesn't trigger
* {{PageRef|Active Reload}}: Now grants +1 Move Speed during the active
* {{PageRef|Backstabber}}: Now only triggers when hitting an enemy within 25m
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Cooldown reduced from 11s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Intensifying Magazine}}: Weapon Damage increased from 40% to 45%
* {{PageRef|Long Range}}: Weapon Damage increased from 35% to 40%
* {{PageRef|Melee Charge}}: Bonus Heavy Damage reduced from 30% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Slowing Bullets}}: Dash distance slow reduced from -25% to -20%
* {{PageRef|Titanic Magazine}}: Weapon Damage reduced from 15% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Weakening Headshot}}: Health bonus increased from +50 to +75
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Spirit power scaling increased from 0.056 to 0.07
* {{PageRef|Berserker}}: Bullet Resistance reduced from 18% to 16%
* {{PageRef|Burst Fire}}: Now grants +10% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|Burst Fire}}: Active Fire Rate reduced from +45% to +35%
* {{PageRef|Burst Fire}}: Cooldown reduced from 8s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Burst Fire}}: Duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Cultist Sacrifice}}: Buff no longer expires on death
* {{PageRef|Cultist Sacrifice}}: Buff duration reduced from 180s to 170s
* {{PageRef|Cultist Sacrifice}}: Bonus health reduced from 300 to 275
* {{PageRef|Escalating Resilience}}: Bonus health increased from +100 to +125
* {{PageRef|Escalating Resilience}}: Stack duration increased from 20s to 24s
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: Weapon Damage reduced from +150% to +125%
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Cooldown increased from 6s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Weapon Damage reduced from +8% to +5%
* {{PageRef|Hollow Point}}: Bullet Resistance Reduction increased from -10% to -12%
* {{PageRef|Hunter's Aura}}: Bullet Resistance Reduction increased from -7% to -8%
* {{PageRef|Point Blank}}: {{PageRef|Melee}} Resistance increased from +25% to +30%
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Weapon Fall-off Range increased from +18% to +20%
* {{PageRef|Spirit Rend}}: Debuff duration reduced from 8s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Tesla Bullets}}: Damage reduced from 45 to 40
* {{PageRef|Toxic Bullets}}: Bleed reduced from 2.6% to 2.5%
* {{PageRef|Armor Piercing Rounds}}: Chance reduced from 65% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Active damage reduced from 200 to 100
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Damage reduced from 45 to 40
* {{PageRef|Crushing Fists}}: Bonus Heavy Damage reduced from 30% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Crushing Fists}}: {{PageRef|Melee}} damage reduced from 25% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Frenzy}}: Bullet Resistance bonuses changed to Spirit Resistance
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}}: Fire Rate per stack increased from +7% to +8%
* {{PageRef|Lucky Shot}}: Chance increased from 20% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}}: Cooldown reduced from 48s to 40s
* {{PageRef|Spiritual Overflow}}: Fire Rate reduced from +40% to +30%
* {{PageRef|Spiritual Overflow}}: Active now also grants +20% Ability Duration
Vitality Items
* {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: Now upgrades from {{PageRef|Sprint Boots}}
* {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: Move Speed increased from +1.75 to +2 (does not grant sprint, +2 Sprint upgrades to +2 Move Speed)
* {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: Slow Resistance reduced from 50% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: No longer grants +75 Bonus Health
* {{PageRef|Enduring Speed}}: Now grants +2 Out of Combat Regen
* {{PageRef|Bullet Lifesteal}}: Bonus Health increased from +70 to +90
* {{PageRef|Debuff Reducer}}: Bonus Health reduced from +75 to +50
* {{PageRef|Enchanter's Emblem}}: Out of Combat Regen reduced from +3 to +2
* {{PageRef|Guardian Ward}}: Bonus Range increased from +8% to +10%
* {{PageRef|Healing Booster}}: Healing Effectiveness reduced from +25% to +20%
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Heal reduced from 300 to 260
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Spirit power scaling increased from 0.93 to 1.3
* {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}: Now grants +5% Spirit Resistance
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Charge up range reduced from 35m to 30m
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Heal spirit scaling reduced from 0.23 to 0.17
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Shielding}}: Now grants +1 Move Speed after the shield triggers
* {{PageRef|Weapon Shielding}}: Now grants +1 Move Speed after the shield triggers
* {{PageRef|Bullet Resilience}}: Low HP trigger increased from +30% to +35%
* {{PageRef|Debuff Remover}}: Move Speed buff duration reduced from 4s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Fury Trance}}: Bonus health increased from +50 to +100
* {{PageRef|Fury Trance}}: Active Bullet Resistance changed to Spirit Resistance
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}}: Heal reduced from 60% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Cooldown reduced from 32s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Barrier increased from 300 to 350
* {{PageRef|Metal Skin}}: Dash Distance penalty reduced from 25% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Rescue Beam}}: Heal reduced from 25% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Spirit Resilience}}: Low HP trigger increased from +30% to +35%
* {{PageRef|Stamina Mastery}}: Air Jump/Dash Distance increased from +25% to +30%
* {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: Max Stacks increased from 14 to 16
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Invis duration reduced from 7s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Cheat Death}}: Duration increased from 4s to 4.5s
* {{PageRef|Cheat Death}}: Cooldown reduced from 130s to 120s
* {{PageRef|Healing Tempo}}: Healing Effectiveness reduced from +30% to +25%
* {{PageRef|Infuser}}: Spirit Power reduced from +35 to +30
* {{PageRef|Phantom Strike}}: Cooldown increased from 30s to 35s
* {{PageRef|Plated Armor}}: On-Hit Prevention Percent reduced from 60% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: No longer grants +10% Bullet Resistance
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Now grants +12% Spirit Resistance
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Cooldown reduced from 0.8s to 0.7s
* {{PageRef|Spellbreaker}}: Cooldown reduced from 14s to 10s
Spirit Items
* {{PageRef|Extra Charge}}: Charged Spirit Power increased from +5 to +7
* {{PageRef|Mystic Burst}}: Chargeup time reduced from 14s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Mystic Regeneration}}: No longer scales with Spirit Power
* {{PageRef|Mystic Regeneration}}: Now upgrades to a new T3 Spirit {{PageRef|Item}}, {{PageRef|Radiant Regeneration}}
* {{PageRef|Rusted Barrel}}: Fire Rate reduction increased from -30% to -35%
* {{PageRef|Arcane Surge}}: Ability Range reduced from +20% to +15%
* {{PageRef|Arcane Surge}}: Ability Duration reduced from +20% to +15%
* {{PageRef|Bullet Resist Shredder}}: Duration increased from 6s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}}: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 24s
* {{PageRef|Compress Cooldown}}: Imbued Cooldown Reduction increased from +18% to +22%
* {{PageRef|Duration Extender}}: {{PageRef|Imbued Ability}} Duration increased from +20% to +22%
* {{PageRef|Quicksilver Reload}}: Chargeup time increased from 16s to 18s
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Damage reduced from 2.75% to 2.5%
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Cooldown increased from 24s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Rapid Recharge}}: Charged Spirit Power increased from +10 to +16
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Cooldown increased from 28s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Silence duration reduced from 4s to 3.75s
* {{PageRef|Surge of Power}}: Spirit Power increased from 22 to 25
* {{PageRef|Tankbuster}}: Damage reduced from 7% to 6%
* {{PageRef|Tankbuster}}: Chargeup time increased from 8s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: Bonus Health increased from 110 to 125

* {{PageRef|Radiant Regeneration}}: New T3 Spirit {{PageRef|Item}}, upgrades from {{PageRef|Mystic Regeneration}}. Dealing damage to enemy heroes grants you +5 HP regen (with 0.04 spirit scaling) for 5s. On ability cast, heals you for +100 and provides +2 Move Speed for 3s. Cooldown 6s.
* {{PageRef|Arctic Blast}}: Cooldown reduced from 30s to 24s
* {{PageRef|Boundless Spirit}}: No longer heals and grants movement speed on ability cast.
* {{PageRef|Boundless Spirit}}: Now grants +10% Spirit Power
* {{PageRef|Boundless Spirit}}: Spirit Power reduced from 40 to 35
* {{PageRef|Echo Shard}}: Cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Escalating Exposure}}: Spirit Amp per Stack increased from 4% to 4.5%
* {{PageRef|Escalating Exposure}}: Max Stacks reduced from 14 to 12
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Cooldown reduced from 24s to 22s
* {{PageRef|Focus Lens}}: Cooldown increased from 27s to 28s
* {{PageRef|Mercurial Magnum}}: Chargeup time increased from 10s to 14s
* {{PageRef|Scourge}}: Damage reduced from 3.5% to 3.25%
* {{PageRef|Spirit Burn}}: Damage Threshold increased from 400 to 500
